T02psarkdhu:1: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
T02psarkdhu:2: namo bhagavate śākyamunaye mahākāruṇikāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
T02psarkdhu:4: oṃ giri giri giriṇi giriṇi girivati guṇavati ākāśavati ākāśaviśuddhe sarvapāpavigate
T02psarkdhu:5: ākāśe gaganatale ākāśavicāriṇi maṇidhari vajriṇi jvalitaśikhare maṇimuktākhacitamaulidhare
T02psarkdhu:6: sukeśe suveṣe suvaktre sunetre suvarṇagaure atīte anutpanne anāgate pratyutpanne
T02psarkdhu:7: namaḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ jvalitaujasāṃ buddhe subuddhe bhagavati surakṣaṇi akṣaya sukṣaya
T02psarkdhu:8: sūkṣme suprabhe sudame sudānte suvrate varade pravare bhagavati bhadravati subhadravati
T02psarkdhu:9: bhadre subhadre vimale jayabhadre caṇḍi pracaṇḍi caṇḍe vajracaṇḍe mahācaṇḍe gauri
T02psarkdhu:10: gandhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi vaccasi sumati pukkasi sumukhi śabari śāvari śaṃkari dramaṇḍi
T02psarkdhu:11: drāmaṇḍi raudriṇi sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani hana hana sarvaśatrūn daha daha
T02psarkdhu:13: paca hṛdayaṃ vidhvaṃsaya jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahāṇāṃ nāśaya naśaya sarvapāpāni me bhagavati /
T02psarkdhu:14: rakṣa rakṣa mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvatra sarvadā sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ /
T02psarkdhu:16: sarvakilviṣanāśani mārtaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍanivāriṇi mānande mānini mahāmānini
T02psarkdhu:17: mānadhāriṇi cale vicale vimale viṭi viṭi taṭi tiṭi niṭi niṭi tuṭṭe dhoriṇi dhariṇi
T02psarkdhu:18: nimiṇi viriṇi vīryaṇi pracale pravarasamare caṇḍāli mātaṅgi rundhasi karasi śarasi
T02psarkdhu:19: varcasi sumati pukkasi śabari śabari śaṃkari mani draviḍi ḍāviḍi hanani dahani pacani
T02psarkdhu:20: pācani marddani sarali sarale saralambhe hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavidāriṇi mahiri mahiri mahāmahili
T02psarkdhu:21: nigaḍe nigaḍabhaṃje marte marte matti mattini dāṃte cakre cakravākini jvale jvale
T02psarkdhu:22: jvalini śabari śābari sarvavyādhihariṇi muni muni cuṇḍi cuṇḍi cuṇḍini cuṇḍini mahācuṇḍini
T02psarkdhu:23: nimi nimi nimiṃdhari trailokyavardhani trilokajanani trilokālokakari traidhātukavyavalokani
T02psarkdhu:25: māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvasthānagata sarvaduṣṭabhayebhyaḥ sarvamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhayebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
T02psarkdhu:26: vajre vajre vajravati vajradhare vajrapāṇidhare hiri hiri mili mili kili kili cili cili śili śili cala cala vala vala varade (Pkdh_142)
T02psarkdhu:32: svasti bhavatu mama sarvasattvānāñ ca svāhā /
T02psarkdhu:38: oṃ jayatu jayavati jayakamale vimale svāhā /
T02psarkdhu:42: oṃ bhuḥ bhūri bhūri vajravati sarvatathāgatahṛdayapūraṇi āyuḥsandhāraṇi bale balavati /
T02psarkdhu:44: oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi hūm hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
T02psarkdhu:45: oṃ maṇivajre hṛdayavajre mārasainyavidrāvaṇi hana hana sarvaśatrūn vajragarbhe trāsaya trāsaya sarvamārabhavanāni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ saṃbhara saṃbhara svāhā /
